name: Mini Soccer 2017 - Finger Football Game
description:
Players can select and drag on their units to adjust the power and direction of the shoot.
Score GOALS to win the match.

Mini Soccer Features:

* Single Player (Player vs AI) or 2-Players
* Simple, but highly addictive
* Casual touch based play
* Appropriate sound effects

* Simple and Fun!
*Capture the true essence of your favorite sport with this Mini Soccer game!
*Absolutely FREE!
